Xbox lays off 650 staff, Tony Hawk is talking to Activision, and Flappy Bird is BACK.

 - On Friday September 13th Organization 13 takes over the Kinda Funny Spare Bedroom and only one man and his friends have the keys and friendships to take it back!  - The STREAM is Mike preparing for Kingdom Hearts 2
